# Project Setup Instructions

## Project Type
Vite + React + TypeScript with shadcn UI, Tailwind CSS v4, and Framer Motion

## Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [x] Clarify project requirements
- [x] Scaffold the project
- [x] Customize the project
- [x] Install required extensions (none needed)
- [x] Compile the project
- [x] Create and run task
- [x] Launch the project
- [x] Ensure documentation is complete

## Project Complete!

All setup steps have been completed successfully. The development server is running at http://localhost:5173/

## Technologies Installed
- Vite 7.2.4
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4 (beta)
- shadcn/ui components (Button, Card)
- Framer Motion
- Lucide React icons

## Created Components
- Hero section with animations
- Showcase section with scroll effects
- Footer with social links
- Button and Card UI components

## Next Steps
Open http://localhost:5173/ in your browser to see the fully responsive application with animations!
